name: Butterfly Attack
description:
Butterfly Attack is a Pokemon like battle game, but you have a move-set that rotates after reaching a certain amount of evolution points that increase by using the ability and over time.

Every turn, one evolutionary point will automatically be given to every ability. By using an ability, you grant it an additional point.

For example, the red ability starts out in its egg form, and to "evolve" it, or rotate it out, it will take exactly one point for it to rotate. Evolving the ability will give it a new ability, and when it reaches the butterfly form, it has its strongest ability and will de-evolve back into its egg form. The evolution path goes like this: Egg --> Larva --> Butterfly --> Egg and repeats.

To play the game, use QWE to use an ability. Red = Q | Blue = W | Green = E

Press Escape to adjust the volume of the song.

Here are all of the abilities in a neat little table:

Wondering what armor does? It's a flat reduction in damage that does not decay upon hit. Only attacks that destroy armor reduce it!

If armor goes into the negative, it increases the damage of an attack by its value!
